execution_plan.description: Count active products per category from the main store. Include categories with zero active products.
execution_plan.query:
SELECT c.id AS category_id, c.name AS category_name, COUNT(p.id) AS product_count
FROM categories c
LEFT JOIN products p
  ON p.category_id = c.id AND p.is_active = true
GROUP BY c.id, c.name
ORDER BY product_count DESC;

execution_plan.description: Count active items per product group from the alternative store. Include groups with zero active items. Items are considered active when items.active = 'Y'.
execution_plan.query:
SELECT pg.gid AS group_id, pg.group_name, COUNT(i.code) AS item_count
FROM product_groups pg
LEFT JOIN items i
  ON i.group_ref = pg.gid AND i.active = 'Y'
GROUP BY pg.gid, pg.group_name
ORDER BY item_count DESC;
